channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- Honor 8 Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- Honor 8 Lite

item.title: CVE-2017-8154|2024-08-05T16:27:22.436Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- honor%208%20lite
item.description: The Themes App Honor 8 Lite Huawei mobile phones with software of versions before Prague-L31C576B172, versions before Prague-L31C530B160, versions before Prague-L31C432B180 has a man-in-the-middle (MITM) vulnerability due to the use of the insecure HTTP protocol for theme download. An attacker may exploit this vulnerability to tamper with downloaded themes.
